snippet: A police officer testified about how rules were broken so that narcotics officers could make their monthly quotas of arrests.
lead_paragraph: A police officer testified about how rules were broken so that narcotics officers could make their monthly quotas of arrests.

headline.main: The Drugs? They Came From the Police
headline.seo: Those Drugs? They Came From the Police
headline.print_headline: The Drugs? They Came From the Police
